document.full_text: south korea's top two telecoms operators sk telecom and kt corp said on tuesday they had suspended online sale of apple's popular ipad 2 tablet due to tight supplies less than a week after they launched the sale.
document.title: sk tel, kt suspend ipad 2 online sale less than week after debut
lines_and_colors: south korea's top two telecoms operators sk telecom and kt corp said on tuesday they had suspended online sale of apple's popular ipad 2 tablet due to tight supplies less than a week after they launched the sale.
